docs.title: IAM & PAM Labs Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the IAM & PAM Labs site.

Use the navigation to explore labs for Azure, AWS, Okta, and CyberArk.

docs.title: AWS IAM Policies Lab
docs.text: Guide to creating and comparing managed vs inline IAM policies.

docs.title: Azure AD MFA Setup Lab
docs.text: Step-by-step guide to enabling MFA for a test user in Azure AD.

docs.title: Okta SAML SSO Lab
docs.text: Guide to configuring SAML SSO in Okta.
